godshot.quote: You get home on the ocean of your own tears

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't know I wanted to quit drinking until I tried to quit drinking

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I drank for just two reasons: to feel good when I felt bad and to feel better when I felt good

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Anybody can stop drinking - just hit a cop

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't come to AA, because I was afraid it would work
If all else fails - follow directions.
If God brings you to it, He will bring you through it.
If God is your co-pilot, you're sitting in the wrong seat.
If I don't continually change, my sobriety date will.
Pray for willingness.
Principles before personalities.
Religion is for people who do not want to go to hell; Spirituality is for people who have already been there.
Remember, it's okay to look back, just don't stare.
Seven days without a meeting makes one weak.
Sobriety and working the steps gives us what alcohol promised, but failed to deliver.
Some of us are so successful, once we sober up, we turn out to be almost as good as we used to think we were when we were drinking.
Sorrow looks back; Worry looks ahead; Faith looks up.
S.P.O.N.S.O.R. - Sober Person Offering Newcomers Suggestions On Recovery.
Take what you can use and leave the rest.
The road to a 4th Step is paved with resentments.
There is no chemical solution to a spiritual problem.
There is no such thing as a bad meeting.
There is still a monkey on my back, he's just sleeping.

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Courage is fear that has said its prayers

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My mind is not a good place to be

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Do not criticise, condemn, or complain

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Don't criticise others; they are just doing what we would be doing under similar circumstances

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Why are you not happy with where you are? Is it not exactly where you placed yourself?

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm not where I want to be, but thank God I'm not where I was

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Doing things the way I thought they should be done is what got me here

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: In order to stay sober, I've got to be willing to be part of my own life

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: There are no victims, just volunteers

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I didn't want to stop drinking, just to stop hurting

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Sometimes It's tough to know God's will for me; It's not posted on billboards

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I was drinking, individual responsibility was not my strong suit

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you pray, just talk to God; when you meditate, just listen

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I first came to the program, members said, "Let us love you until you can love yourself."

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When I first came, they said, "It will get better." I discovered the "it" was me
Those who anger us the most are our greatest teachers.
TIME = Things I Must Earn.
We are egomaniacs with low self-esteem.
We are not human beings having a spiritual experience; we are spiritual beings having a human experience.
We don't get sober in pairs.
Aka Under Every Dress there's a slip.
We grow through attraction not promotion.

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: What goes around comes around, if you stick around

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Act as if

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Change is a process, not an event

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Don't drink even if your rear is on fire

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: You can't get mugged in a dark alley if you Don't walk in dark alleys

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Wherever you go, there you are

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: If you truly understand someone, you will have no need to forgive that person

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: I'm not impatient - I just want everything to change right away

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It took every drink I took to get here

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: It's amazing how this program works when I get out of the way

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Happiness is a by-product of doing the right thing

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Perhaps the only purpose of my sobriety is to stop hurting myself and others

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Ego: The sum total of false ideas about myself

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Check your motives

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: My favourite prayer has only one word: Help
God wants us to go to meetings, so He can give us our daily messages.

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: When you're afraid, pick up the five-hundred-pound telephone and call someone

godshot.book: My Mind Is Out To Get Me
godshot.quote: Platitudes can help with your attitudes
